original_title: Sansone e il tesoro degli Incas
overview: A cowboy goes to help out his friend, who has been falsely accused of murder. The two find themselves in the rugged and mysterious Pallidi Mountains, where they come up against an outlaw gang that is searching for a buried Inca treasure, which is guarded by a lot Inca tribe.
tagline: The Wild West...Where Desperados Slept by Day...Struck by Night...Renegades After the Fabulous Aztec Treasure...
title: Lost Treasure of the Incas
